Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 59th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1971...
Injured on 6/27/1973 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 3 days...
Injured on 8/16/1973 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 6/9/1975, off Billy Farmer (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/13/1975, off Dennis Eckersley (STL)...
Traded from San Francisco to Philadelphia on 5/5/1976 (Going to SF: RF G. Foster. Going to PHI: LF J. Royster, LF H. Washington, 2B G. Pryor)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Houston on 7/27/1976...
Injured on 6/15/1978 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 5/6/1979 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1980, hitting .545 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against Houston on 5/2/1982...
Injured on 5/24/1982 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
